page.title: 07Old Barn Farm Orchard
page.content: {The orchard,}owned by Mr.Henry Woods consists of 45 acres{apples,}2 acres {strawberries,}1 acre{gooseberries,}two polythene tunnels for out of season strawberries and 1 packhouse.{Farm machinery consists of 6 tractors, 2 airblast sprayers, 2 large tractors mowers, 1 rotovator, 1 plough, 1 hedge cutter and 2 tractor fork lifts. {The apple trees}are grown in 8 ft weed-free strips with mown grass between the strips. Each tree has 1 bale of straw round it to keep in the water. The trees are{sprayed}to control{pests & diseases}and with {growth regulators. } {The picked apples}are taken in bulk bins to the packhouse, polished, substandard fruit removed, sorted by weight, prepacked in polythene bags and quickly cooled before transport in refrigerated lorries to supermarkets.
